page.title: 19THAKEHAM PARISH COUNCIL
page.content: Every year there has to be an{Annual {Parish Meeting.}Anybody can come.There is a guest speaker, they will talk about schools, hospitals, or maybe the Police Force. It helps people to get to know each other. The people of the Parish{vote}for the Council. This happens every 4 years. You have to be 18 before you can vote. A Parish Council is for the village and one person is to be{Chairman.}The Council meets once every month, anyone can come. A Parish Council is responsible for cutting the{grass by the roads}and for {Road Safety.}They also deal with {Transport, Buildings, New Development, {School provision and Health needs. The Council meets in the{Village Hall near to the Church, and talk about the {Village Rates and action}that's needed They also give money to{plant trees.
